OOC: Well, at least it got a response out of you.

Taking the hits, Pumskin roars and drops Blackfang.  Transforming to 
beast mode, he flees in the direction of the Pred base.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> OOC: That's moding. I won't accept this last one.
> 
> BIC:
> 
> Katya's fast speed allows her to dodge the lasers. Seeing that 
> Pumpskin had raised his tentacles to take care of Blackfang, it 
leaves 
> his wound open. She fires all weapons at it.
> 
> Blackfang, in the meantime, decides to act.
> 
> Blackfang: We'll see about that, freak!
> 
> He transforms to wolf mode and starts to gnaw the plant-bot.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: Normally I'd wait for a reply, but time constraints dictate 
> > otherwise.
> > 
> > Pumpskin turns and flees the scene of the crime, so to speak, 
headed 
> > for Predacon HQ - with Blackfang an unwilling passenger.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > "Teeheehee, I'm a Predacon!" Pumpskin giggles as he lifts the 
> > > entangled Maximal easily into the air.  (This guy's extremely 
> > strong, 
> > > BTW.  He could lift a dumpster off the ground with those 
things, 
> > and 
> > > dump it out.)  "What more needs to be said?"
> > > 
> > > His other two tentacles retreat from attacking Katya and join
> > > their siblings in applying crushing pressure on Blackfang.  He 
> > fires 
> > > his eye lasers at Katya to keep her busy.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > Katya being cold-headed most of the time had kept her weapons 
up 
> > > just 
> > > > in case. It paid off, as she shot the incoming tendrils as 
soon 
> > as 
> > > she 
> > > > saw them.
> > > > 
> > > > Blackfang, on the other hand, had not been so pessimist and 
was 
> > > soon 
> > > > entangled in a mass of vines. He tried to look for a way out 
and 
> > > > thought he had found one...
> > > > 
> > > > Blackfang: What are you doing, fool? Why are you attacking us?
> > > > 
> > > > Katya: Stravag freebirth traitor! You do not even deserve a 
> > > warrior's 
> > > > death!
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > > OOC: Blackfang and Katya.  He IS psychotic, after all.
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > OOC: Is Pumpskin attacking Fury and Riekan or Blackfang 
and 
> > > Katya?
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Ragnar's situation was deteriorating. Another poisoned 
blast 
> > > hit 
> > > > > him 
> > > > > > and an explosion twisted his fright foot backward. But he 
> was 
> > > too 
> > > > > > groggy to feel it.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> 
wrote:
> > > > > > > OOC: They're firing the same weapons as always - 
explosive 
> > > > > harpoons 
> > > > > > > and cybervenom blasts.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > The surprised Rogues take to the air to avoid the 
sudden 
> > > barrage 
> > > > > of 
> > > > > > > counterfire.  Riekan's harpoon gun and Fury's 
cybervenom 
> > dart-
> > > > > > > launcher speak in reply.  Looking at Pumpskin, Fury 
shakes 
> > > his 
> > > > > > > head.  "I thought that joker was on our side!"
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Answering the charge, Pumpskin suddenly strikes out at 
his 
> > > > > > > two "allies", seeking once again to ensnare them with 
his 
> > > > > tentacles 
> > > > > > > (two tendrils each), this time with the appendages 
seeping 
> > > > > caustic 
> > > > > > > fluids.  "He is!" the crazed warrior chortles.
> > > > > > >

> > > > > > > > Windlord:
> > > > > > > >
